## Cohort Summary 
This is a Cohort for the Symbiosis in Aquatic Systems Initiative ([SASI](https://www.moore.org/initiative-strategy-detail?initiativeId=symbiosis-in-aquatic-systems-initiative)), funded by the [Gordon and Betty Moore Foundation](https://www.moore.org/). We are co-leading with [protocols.io](https://www.protocols.io/).

**Website and participating teams:**

- <https://openscapes.github.io/2021-sasi>

Learn more about Openscapes and the Champions Program: <https://openscapes.org>.
